directions: Sauté the carrot in oil for 2 to 3 minutes, until almost tender. Add the zucchini and scallion and sauté for 2 to 4 minutes. Add black pepper to taste and turn off heat. Add the lemon juice, mint, and salt to taste.

html.directions: Sauté the carrot in oil for 2 to 3 minutes, until almost tender. Add the zucchini and scallion and sauté for 2 to 4 minutes. Add black pepper to taste and turn off heat. Add the lemon juice, mint, and salt to taste.
html.ingredients:
• 1 Tbs. olive oil
  • 2 cups julienned carrot
  • 4 cups julienned green zucchini
  • 4 scallions, thinly sliced on the diagonal
  • Freshly ground black pepper
  • 2 Tbs. fresh lemon juice
  • ½ cup minced fresh mint
  • Salt

ingredients:
1 Tbs. olive oil
2 cups julienned carrot
4 cups julienned green zucchini
4 scallions, thinly sliced on the diagonal
Freshly ground black pepper
2 Tbs. fresh lemon juice
½ cup minced fresh mint
Salt
name: Julienned Zucchini and Carrots with Lemon and Mint
